comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I have a strategy to stop people from being scammed. I'll give it to you for free I suppose. To the community, don't fall for this shit. If he has some sort of dice strat or whatever, it will bust eventually. He just hasn't busted on his attempts. There is no such thing as a casino giving you free money daily playing their games.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: We are aware about this kind of services, we knew that this will turn into a scam later on.There's no such thing called combinations for bonus, you can't outsmart the gambling site especially if you are going to spend first just to get scammed later on. There's a lot of services like this before, guess what? They turn into a scam and this is another warning for the newbies not to try this kind of services, gambling doesn't work like this.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: If you can make 500 EUR for yourself then a good advice from me is to keep it for yourself and not tell anyone.The more people know about a system the more risks of it ending to function.Based on how you have formulated your post it looks clear that you are trying to phish/scam unsuspecting noobs but unfortunately for you there are no more that many noobs here.A lot of them are here when the Bitcoin price goes massively up while now we are only at over 20k and many people are talking about Bitcoin is dead for the 1000 time.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: veki1311 on August 05, 2022, 12:15:33 PMHello I have combination for bonus. Strategy is working 100 % . You can earn 500 eur to 1000 eur every day. I will teach you every step . Payment can be via Escrow  Price is 2000 eur . Telegram is @tibeto123I hope no one fell for this or have ever been have transacted with this kind of "service" before. Any casino or house games are built for houses to have the advantage over player. Because of that reason, not even one player will have a 100% profit every time playing these games regardless of what "strategy" you are using. I have seen someone before from a casino's bet history, a player is continuously winning on a roulette which isn't live, something like slot game which doesn't include any other player except you. Later on I've seen some losses from his bets.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: If it is effective, make it enriching yourself and not victimize others. No one will believe this is even free, let alone paid make sure you take advantage with proof. Otherwise I am 100% sure you are just baiting victims who know nothing about gambling.Be careful pals, no platform gives it your all for you to take without having something desired from you.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I just read your previous thread and I couldn't comprehend any from your post, could it be you have correct scores that you want to sell of for betting?Please try to learn how to write and explain yourself properly for people to understand what you mean or your mission.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: I learned from the smart people and more experienced people on this forum, that expecting profit from an unknown person by sending money to that person will lead to depression and loss of common sense. The schemes they implement are nothing more than scams, there no evidence that explains it is worst, the community should be more aware of them.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: I have a strategy too. You can double that money even more but you have to pay me first before I show you the technique. Payment can also be in escrow using one of my trusted escrow that I know.  Seriously though, if anyone fall for this scam, I'll offer no sympathy and I'll laugh my hardest instead. Who would, in their sane mind, share a technic that is 'proven' to give you loads of money? I mean, the amount you're asking for is only 4-5 days of work from your method, and since you're the only one who knows about it, chances are you'll milk whatever platform that is until they get suspicious of your actions.Just stop mate.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: If I have that strategy, I won't tell to anybody. I'll make sure that I'll be rich with that found strategy of mine and will never ever sell it to the others unless I'm pretty rich already and it's no use to me because I just want to share it and I'm done with it.But the reality, in gambling, there's no strategy that lasts long in casinos. It's either the casino will find it out and will change the algorithm so that found strategy won't work anymore.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: If you come intending to scam people on the forums, I'm sure it's not easy. Even new members here can find out more easily that this is a scam. Talking about gambling profits is only in the control and luck of the user itself. no need for intervention or bidding of others like you.Since this is a thread for gambling luckily not mentioning which platform you are referring to. It was quite shady and suspicious.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: I don't understand people offering to sell schemes of "working strategies" of earnings, and indeed someone can really believe in this for real, only one thing is obvious to stay as far away from such a partnership as possible.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner

I will teach you every step . Payment can be via Escrow  Price is 2000 eur . Telegram is @tibeto123This poster is probably a scammerI would avoid him like the pest he is.
